title: New: Their Wedding – Hiding
body: Impressing with their debut single, [_Want_](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/23858-new-their-wedding-want/), LA duo **Their Wedding** are back, with a new electro-pop gem, _Hiding_. Mixing the autotuned vocals with slightly cheesy, albeit brilliant songwriting, Michael and Alvaro, formerly of California indie-pop outfit The Motel Life, have hit upon the winning formula. Check out Hiding below, and keep up with [Their Wedding](https://www.facebook.com/TheirWedding) on Facebook.
